summary: Pet Shop Boys are an English synth-pop duo formed in 1981, made up of Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe. They've sold over 100 million records and are known for blending pop with classical and other artsy influences. They've had big hits like "West End Girls" and "It's a Sin," and have won many awards, including three Brit Awards. They're one of the most successful duos in UK music history.
title: Pet Shop Boys
